trans-unit.source: You can also use multiple column layout as your legacy browser plan, as the column-* properties do not apply when applied to a grid container.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以将多列布局用作旧版浏览器计划，因为 column-* 属性在应用于网格容器时不适用。

trans-unit.source: You can also use negative values with order, which can be quite useful. If you want to make one item display first, and leave the order of all other items unchanged, you can give that item an order of -1. As this is lower than 0 the item will always be displayed first.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以按顺序使用负值，这很有用。如果要首先显示一个项目，并保持所有其他项目的顺序不变，则可以将该项目的顺序设为 -1 。由于该值小于0，因此始终会首先显示该项目。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the span keyword here. My next item will be placed from the 7th line named col-start and span 3 lines.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在此处使用 span 关键字。我的下一个项目将从名为 col-start 的第7行开始，并跨越3行。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the span keyword in the value of grid-row-start/grid-row-end and grid-column-start/grid-column-end. The following two examples will create the same grid area. In the first we set the start row line, then the end line we explain that we want to span 3 lines. The area will start at line 1 and span 3 lines to line 4.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以在 grid-row-start / grid-row-end 和 grid-column-start/grid-column-end 的值中使用 span 关键字。以下两个示例将创建相同的网格区域。首先，我们设置开始行线，然后设置结束线，我们要跨越3条线。该区域将从第1行开始，跨3行到第4行。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the value space-between to take all the spare space after the items have been laid out, and share it out evenly between the items so there will be an equal amount of space between each item. To cause an equal amount of space on the right and left of each item use the value space-around. With space-around, items have a half-size space on either end. Or, to cause items to have equal space around them use the value space-evenly. With space-evenly, items have a full-size space on either end.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以使用 space-between 的值来分配物料后的所有备用空间，并在各个物料之间平均分配，以便每个物料之间有相等的空间。要在每个项目的左右两侧留出相等的空间，请使用 space-around 值。使用 space-around 时，项目的两端都有一半大小的空间。或者，要使项目周围具有相等的空间，请 space-evenly 使用值space。如果使用 space-evenly ，则项目的两端都有全尺寸空间。

trans-unit.source: You can alter the alignment of the replaced element's content object within the element's box using the object-position property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 object-position 属性在元素框内更改替换元素的内容对象的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: You can apply multiple backgrounds to elements. These are layered atop one another with the first background you provide on top and the last background listed in the back. Only the last background can include a background color.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将多个背景应用于元素。这些背景相互叠放，您提供的第一个背景位于顶部，背面提供了最后一个背景。只有最后的背景可以包括背景颜色。

trans-unit.source: You can assign some or all of the lines in your grid a name when you define your grid with the grid-template-rows and grid-template-columns properties. To demonstrate I’ll use the simple layout created in the guide on line-based placement. This time I’ll create the grid using named lines.
trans-unit.target: 使用 grid-template-rows 和 grid-template-columns 属性定义网格时，可以为网格中的部分或全部行分配名称。为了演示，我将使用基于行的放置指南中创建的简单布局。这次，我将使用命名线创建网格。

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid with fixed track sizes – using pixels for example. This sets the grid to the specified pixel which fits to the layout you desire. You can also create a grid using flexible sizes with percentages or with the new fr unit designed for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 您可以创建具有固定轨道尺寸的网格，例如使用像素。这会将网格设置为适合您所需布局的指定像素。您也可以使用具有百分比的灵活尺寸或为此目的设计的新 fr 单位来创建网格。

trans-unit.source: You can create some interesting effects however with just this simple technique. In my final example of this section, I have floated two elements left and right, giving each a border-radius of 100% in the direction closest to the text.
trans-unit.target: 然而,你可以用这个简单的技术创造一些有趣的效果。在本节的最后一个例子中,我将两个元素左右浮动,在最靠近文本的方向上给每个元素一个100%的边界半径。

trans-unit.source: You can define an explicit grid with grid layout but the specification also deals with the content added outside of a declared grid, which adds additional rows and columns when needed. Features such as adding “as many columns that will fit into a container” are included.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用网格布局定义显式网格，但是规范还处理在声明的网格外部添加的内容，并在需要时添加其他行和列。包括诸如添加“尽可能多的列以适合容器”的功能。

trans-unit.source: You can define an explicit grid with grid layout. The Grid Layout specification is flexible enough to add additional rows and columns when needed. Features such as adding “as many columns that will fit into a container” are included.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用网格布局定义显式网格。网格布局规范足够灵活，可以在需要时添加其他行和列。包括诸如添加“可容纳在容器中的尽可能多的列”之类的功能。

trans-unit.source: You can do this with both the shorthand background property and the individual properties thereof except for background-color. That is, the following background properties can be specified as a list, one per background: background, background-attachment, background-clip, background-image, background-origin, background-position, background-repeat, background-size.
trans-unit.target: 您可以同时使用速记 background 属性及其各个属性（ background-color 除外）来执行此操作。也就是说，可以将以下背景属性指定为一个列表，每个背景一个： background ， background-attachment ， background-clip ， background-image ， background-origin ， background-position ， background-repeat ， background-size 。

trans-unit.source: You can get additional control over animations — as well as useful information about them — by making use of animation events. These events, represented by the AnimationEvent object, can be used to detect when animations start, finish, and begin a new iteration. Each event includes the time at which it occurred as well as the name of the animation that triggered the event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过使用动画事件来获得对动画的附加控制以及有关动画的有用信息。这些由 AnimationEvent 对象表示的事件可用于检测动画何时开始，结束和开始新的迭代。每个事件都包括事件发生的时间以及触发事件的动画的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can pass additional arguments via the CSS paint() function. In this example, we passed two arguments: whether the background-image on a group of list items is filled or just has a stroke outline, and the width of that outline:

trans-unit.target: 你可以使用线号、名称或目标网格的某个区域将项目放置到网格的精确位置。网格还包含一个算法来控制网格上没有明确位置的项目的放置。

trans-unit.source: You can position the center of the gradient with keyterms, percentage, or absolute lengths, length and percentage values repeating if only one is present, otherwise in the order of position from the left and position from the top.
trans-unit.target: 你可以用keyterms、百分比或绝对长度来定位渐变的中心,如果只有一个,则长度和百分比值重复,否则按照从左到右和从上到下的顺序定位。

trans-unit.source: You can provide more than two arguments, if you have multiple constraints to apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有多个约束条件要应用,你可以提供两个以上的参数。

trans-unit.source: You can read more about the relationship between flexbox and the Writing Modes specification in a later article; however, the following description should help explain why we do not talk about left and right and top and bottom when we describe the direction that our flex items flow in.

trans-unit.source: You can see from the live example below that in order to create gaps that do not also create a gap at the edges of the container, we need to use negative margins on the flex container itself. Any border on the flex container is then moved to a second wrapper in order that the negative margin can pull the items up to that wrapper element.
trans-unit.target: 从下面的实战示例中可以看出,为了在容器边缘不产生间隙,我们需要在flex容器本身使用负边距。然后,flex容器上的任何边框都会被移动到第二个包装器上,以便负边距可以将物品拉到该包装器元素上。

trans-unit.source: You can see how the item is aligned by using the Firefox Grid Highlighter:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Firefox Grid Highlighter查看项目的对齐方式：

trans-unit.source: You can see how this then leaves gaps in the grid, as for the auto-placed items if grid comes across an item that doesn’t fit into a track, it will move to the next row until it finds a space the item can fit in.
trans-unit.target: 您会看到它如何在网格中留下空隙，至于自动放置的项目，如果网格遇到的项目不适合轨道，它将移动到下一行，直到找到该项目可以容纳的空间在。

trans-unit.source: You can see in the live example below how this looks. Try editing the items or adding additional items in order to test the initial behavior of flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在下面的实战例子中看到它的样子。尝试编辑项目或添加额外的项目,以测试flexbox的初始行为。

trans-unit.source: You can see that DIV #2 (z-index: 2) is above DIV #3 (z-index: 1), because they both belong to the same stacking context (the root one), so z-index values rule how elements are stacked.
trans-unit.target: 你可以看到DIV #2(z-index:2)高于DIV #3(z-index:1),因为它们都属于同一个堆叠上下文(根目录),所以z-index值决定了元素的堆叠方式。

trans-unit.source: You can see that the item is taking the area from grid column line 2 to 4, and starting after line 1. Then it is offset in that area using the top and left properties. However, it has been taken out of flow as is usual for absolutely positioned items and so the auto-placement rules now place items into the same space. The item also doesn’t cause the additional row to be created to span to row line 3.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到该项目将区域从网格列第2行移至第4行，并从第1行开始。然后使用top和left属性在该区域中将其偏移。但是，它已像绝对放置物品一样从流程中删除，因此自动放置规则现在将物品放置在同一空间中。该项目也不会导致额外的行被创建到第3行。

trans-unit.source: You can see that the item is taking the area from grid row line 2 to 4, and starting after line 1. Then it is offset in that area using the top and left properties. However, it has been taken out of flow as is usually for absolutely positioned items and so the auto-placement rules now place items into the same space. The item also doesn’t cause the additional row to be created to span to row line 3.
trans-unit.target: 您可以看到该项目正在将区域从网格行2移到4，并从第1行开始。然后使用top和left属性在该区域中将其偏移。但是，它已像通常用于绝对定位的项目一样被淘汰，因此自动放置规则现在将项目放置在同一空间中。该项目也不会导致额外的行被创建到第3行。

trans-unit.source: You can see the background colour of the following paragraph running underneath, it is only the line boxes of that paragraph that have been shortened to cause the effect of wrapping content around the float. The box of our paragraph is still displaying according to the rules of normal flow. This is why, to make space around a floated item, you must add a margin to the item, in order to push the line boxes away from it. You cannot apply anything to the following in-flow content to achieve that.
trans-unit.target: 你可以看到下面一段的背景色在下面运行,只是该段的行框被缩短了,造成了包裹内容的浮动效果。我们段落的方框还是按照正常的流程规则来显示的。这就是为什么,要在浮动项周围留出空间,就必须给该项添加一个边距,以便将行框推离它。你不能对下面的in-flow内容应用任何东西来实现。

trans-unit.source: You can see the effect of animation-fill-mode in the following example. It demonstrates how, for an animation that runs for an infinite time, you can cause it to remain in its final state rather than reverting to the original state (which is the default).
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，您可以看到 animation-fill-mode 的效果。它演示了如何对无限长的动画运行，使其动画保持其最终状态，而不是恢复为原始状态（默认状态）。

trans-unit.source: You can see the effect of scroll-margin by scrolling to a point partway between two of the "pages" of the example's content. The value specified for scroll-margin determines how much of the page that's primarily outside the snapport should remain visible.
trans-unit.target: 通过滚动到示例内容的两个“页面”之间的某个点，可以看到 scroll-margin 的效果。为 scroll-margin 指定的值确定主要在快照端口之外的页面中应保持可见的数量。

trans-unit.source: You can see the layout taking shape in the value of grid-template-areas. The header spans over two column tracks, as does the nav. In the third row track we have the sidebar alongside the content. In the fourth row track I have chosen to place my ad content – so it appears under the sidebar, then the footer next to it under the content. I’m using a flexbox on the navigation to display it in a row spaced out.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在 grid-template-areas 的值中看到布局正在成形。所述 header 在两个柱轨道跨度，一样的 nav 。在第三行轨道中， content 旁边有 sidebar 。在第四行的轨道中，我选择放置 ad 内容-使其显示在侧边栏下方，然后显示在内容下方的 footer 。我在导航上使用了一个flexbox，以隔开的行显示它。

trans-unit.source: You can see the named lines in the image, note that some lines have two names - for example sd-end and main-start refer to the same column line.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在图像中看到已命名的行，请注意，有些行具有两个名称-例如 sd-end 和 main-start 引用同一列行。

trans-unit.source: You can see the same example as used for align-items, below. This time we are applying the justify-self property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在下面看到与 align-items 相同的示例。这次，我们将应用 justify-self 属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use placement properties while still taking advantage of auto-placement. In this next example I have added to the layout by setting odd items to span two tracks both for rows and columns. I do this with the grid-column-end and grid-row-end properties and setting the value of this to span 2. What this means is that the start line of the item will be set by auto-placement, and the end line will span two tracks.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在仍然利用自动放置功能的同时使用放置属性。在下一个示例中，我通过设置奇数项以跨越行和列的两个轨道来添加布局。我使用 grid-column-end 和 grid-row-end 属性，并将其值设置为 span 2 。这意味着该项目的起始行将通过自动放置来设置，而结束行将跨越两条轨道。

trans-unit.source: You can use the grid-area property to specify all four lines of a grid area as one value. When people first encounter this, they are often surprised that the values do not follow the same order as the shorthand for margin – which runs clockwise: top, right, bottom, left.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 grid-area 属性将网格区域的所有四行指定为一个值。当人们第一次遇到这种情况时，他们常常会惊讶地发现值没有遵循与保证金速记相同的顺序–顺时针运行：上，右，下，左。

trans-unit.source: You can use the -ms-wrap-through property to control the effect of exclusions; for instance, to cause one content block to wrap around an exclusion element and another to intersect the same exclusion element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 -ms-wrap-through 属性来控制排除的效果。例如，导致一个内容块环绕一个排除元素，而另一个内容块与同一排除元素相交。

trans-unit.source: You can use the :target pseudo-class to create a lightbox without using any JavaScript. This technique relies on the ability of anchor links to point to elements that are initially hidden on the page. Once targeted, the CSS changes their display so that they are shown.

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 columns 简写形式设置 column-count 和 column-width 。如果设置长度单位，则此单位将用于 column-width ，设置整数，并将其用于 column-count 。您可以设置两者，并用空格分隔两个值。

trans-unit.source: You could add a label or icon to the left as easily as we popped the button onto the right. I have added a label, and other than some styling for background colour I didn’t need to change the layout. The stretchy input field now has a little less space to play with but it uses the space left after the two items are accounted for.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在左侧添加标签或图标，就像我们将按钮弹出到右侧一样容易。我添加了一个标签，除了背景颜色的某些样式外，我不需要更改布局。可伸缩输入字段现在可以使用的空间要少一些，但是它使用了考虑了两项后剩下的空间。

trans-unit.source: You could also allow both sides to grow and shrink in proportion. If you set both sides to flex: 1, they will grow and shrink from a flex-basis of 0, so you will end up with two equal-sized columns. You could either take the content as a guide and set both to flex: auto, in which case they would grow and shrink from the size of the content or any size applied directly to the flex items such as a width on the image.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以允许双方按比例增长和收缩。如果将两边都设置为 flex: 1 ，则它们将从 flex-basis 为0开始增长和收缩，因此最终将得到两个相等大小的列。您既可以将内容作为指导，也可以将二者都设置为 flex: auto ，在这种情况下，它们会根据内容的大小或直接应用于flex项目的任何大小（例如图像的宽度）而增长和缩小。

trans-unit.source: You could also give each side different flex-grow factors, for example setting the side with the image to flex: 1 and the content side to flex: 3. This will mean they use a flex-basis of 0 but distribute that space at different rates according to the flex-grow factor you have assigned. The flex properties we use to do this are described in detail in the guide Controlling ratios of flex items along the main axis.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以为每侧提供不同的 flex-grow 因子，例如，将图像一侧设置为 flex: 1 ，将内容一侧设置为 flex: 3 。这意味着他们使用的 flex-basis 为 0 ,但根据您分配的 flex-grow 因子以不同的速率分配该空间。我们用来控制挠曲特性的挠曲特性在《控制沿着主轴的挠曲项的比率》指南中有详细描述。

trans-unit.source: You could also try removing the background image completely, thus using the gradient purely to create the shape and not displaying it on the page at all.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以尝试完全去掉背景图片,从而纯粹使用渐变来创建形状,完全不在页面上显示。

trans-unit.source: You do need something to float, but that could be some generated content as in the below example. I am floating generated content and using a larger star image to shape my content without displaying any image on the page.
trans-unit.target: 你确实需要一些东西来浮动,但这可能是一些生成的内容,就像下面的例子。我正在浮动生成的内容,并使用一个更大的星形图像来塑造我的内容,而不在页面上显示任何图像。

trans-unit.source: You don't have to leave your color stops at their default positions. To fine-tune their locations, you can give each one a percentage or absolute length value. If you specify the location as a percentage, 0% represents the starting point, while 100% represents the ending point; however, you can use values outside that range if necessary to get the effect you want. If you leave a location unspecified, the position of that particular color stop will be automatically calculated for you.
trans-unit.target: 您不必将色标停留在默认位置。要微调其位置，可以为每个位置指定一个百分比或绝对长度值。如果将位置指定为百分比，则 0% 代表起点，而 100% 代表终点；但是，如果需要，可以使用该范围之外的值以获得所需的效果。如果您未指定位置，则将自动为您计算该特定色标的位置。

trans-unit.source: You don't have to leave your color stops at their default positions. To fine-tune their locations, you can give each one zero, one, or two percentage or, for radial and linear gradients, absolute length values. If you specify the location as a percentage, 0% represents the starting point, while 100% represents the ending point; however, you can use values outside that range if necessary to get the effect you want. If you leave a location unspecified, the position of that particular color stop will be automatically calculated for you, with the first color stop being at 0% and the last color stop being at 100%, and any other color stops being half way between their adjacent color stops.
trans-unit.target: 您不必将色标停留在默认位置。要微调它们的位置，您可以给每个值一个零，一个或两个百分比，或者对于径向和线性渐变，给定绝对长度值。如果将位置指定为百分比，则 0% 代表起点，而 100% 代表终点；但是，如果需要，可以使用该范围之外的值来获得所需的效果。如果您未指定位置，则会自动为您计算该特定色标的位置，第一个色标为 0% ，最后一个色标为 100% ，其他任何色标介于两者之间相邻的颜色停止。

trans-unit.source: You don't have to limit yourself to two colors—you may use as many as you like! By default, colors are evenly spaced along the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 您不必将自己限制为两种颜色，您可以随意使用任意多种颜色！默认情况下，颜色沿渐变均匀间隔。

trans-unit.source: You don't! The feature is enabled by default in supporting browsers. In most cases anchored scrolling is exactly what you want — content jumping is a poor experience for anyone.

trans-unit.source: You may also find that some variable fonts come split into two files: one for uprights and all their variations, and one containing the italic variations. This is sometimes done to reduce the overall file size in cases where the italics aren't needed or used. In all cases, it is still possible to link them with a common font-family name so you can call them using the same font-family and appropriate font-style.
trans-unit.target: 您可能还会发现一些可变字体分为两个文件：一个用于竖立字体及其所有变体，另一个包含斜体变体。在不需要或不使用斜体的情况下，有时这样做是为了减小文件的整体大小。在所有情况下，仍然可以使用通用的 font-family 名称来链接它们，因此您可以使用相同的 font-family 和适当的 font-style 对其进行调用。

trans-unit.source: You may combine any number of functions to manipulate the rendering. The following example enhances the contrast and brightness of the image.

trans-unit.source: You may need to test support for more than one property in your feature query. To do so, you can include a list of features to test for, separated by and keywords:
trans-unit.target: 您可能需要在功能查询中测试对多个属性的支持。为此，您可以包含要测试的功能列表，以 and 关键字分隔：

trans-unit.source: You may specify multiple delays, which is useful when transitioning multiple properties. Each delay will be applied to the corresponding property as specified by the transition-property property, which acts as a master list. If there are fewer delays specified than in the master list, the list of delay values will be repeated until there are enough. If there are more delays, the list of delay values will be truncated to match the number of properties. In both cases, the CSS declaration remains valid.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定多个延迟，这在转换多个属性时很有用。每个延迟都将应用于由 transition-property 属性指定的相应属性，该属性用作主列表。如果指定的延迟少于主列表中的延迟，则将重复延迟值列表，直到有足够的延迟为止。如果有更多的延迟，则延迟值列表将被截断以匹配属性的数量。在这两种情况下，CSS声明仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: You may specify multiple durations; each duration will be applied to the corresponding property as specified by the transition-property property, which acts as a master list. If there are fewer durations specified than in the master list, the user agent repeat the list of durations. If there are more durations, the list is simply truncated to the right size. In both case the CSS declaration stays valid.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定多个持续时间；每个持续时间将应用于 transition-property 属性指定的相应属性，该属性用作主列表。如果指定的持续时间少于主列表中的持续时间，则用户代理将重复该持续时间列表。如果持续时间更长，则该列表将被截断为正确的大小。在这两种情况下，CSS声明均保持有效。

trans-unit.source: You may specify multiple timing functions; each one will be applied to the corresponding property as specified by the transition-property property, which acts as a transition-property list. If there are fewer timing functions specified than in the transition-property list, the user agent must calculate which value is used by repeating the list of values until there is one for each transition property. If there are more timing functions, the list is simply truncated to the right size. In both cases, the CSS declaration stays valid.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定多个计时功能。每个属性将应用到由 transition-property 属性指定的相应属性，该属性用作 transition-property 列表。如果指定的计时功能少于 transition-property 列表中的计时功能，则用户代理必须通过重复值列表直到每个过渡属性都包含一个值，来计算使用哪个值。如果还有更多计时功能，则该列表将被截断为正确的大小。在这两种情况下，CSS声明均保持有效。
